text: ara abasya'i amara pratyeka jatira madhye rasula pathiyechilama e nirdesa diye ye, tomara allahâ€Œra ibadata kara ebam tagutake barjana kara [1]. Atahpara tadera kichu sankhyakake allahâ€Œ hidayata diyechena, ara tadera kichu sankhyakera upara pathabhranti sabyasta hayechila; kaje'i tomara yamine paribhramana kara atahpara dekhe na'o mithyaropakaridera parinama ki hayeche
